product.title: Lambert - The Charles Vegan Leather Backpack in Black
product.body_html: We all love a multitasker that adapts to our lifestyle and this bag has it all. Made with premium, PETA-certified vegan leather, its weather-resistant design and large storage capacity blend style and functionality. 47cm (height) x 30cm (width) x 11cm (depth).
